summary: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.
cast: Miyoko Shôji|Mami Koyama|Fumiko Orikasa|Shôzô Îzuka|Shouko Tsuda|Hirotaka Suzuoki|Hisako Kyôda|Kan Tokumaru|Tomie Kataoka|Takkô Ishimori|Masamichi Satô|Masaya Onosaka|Masane Tsukayama|Kôichi Yamadera|Stephen Bent|Greg Chun|Matt Devereaux|Ben Diskin|Felicity Duncan|Barbara Goodson|JP Karliak|Jo Lee|Mona Marshall|Stuart Milligan|Laura Post|Regina Reagan|Cindy Robinson|Samantha Shaw|Keith Silverstein|Christopher Swindle|Abby Trott|John Vernon|Erin Yvette
title: Millennium Actress
